name: You're Trying To Get To The Party But All You Have Is A Poorly Drawn Map And Bad Directions.
name_original: You're Trying To Get To The Party But All You Have Is A Poorly Drawn Map And Bad Directions.
description:
short jam game about exploring a forest and navigating a map as you try to find a party. Made over a long weekend as a small game jam project. probably still has a few bugs i didnt have time catch.

navigate and proceed through text by clicking with the mouse.

programming, design and art by me, audio from freesound.com
